email_content:
Hi Ethan,

Hope you're well. I'm excited to kick off the cover design for Clara Bellamy's upcoming novel, "Whispers of the Past."  

Key creative direction:
• Mood: Mystery blended with a touch of nostalgia  
• Key visuals: An old, ornate key and a faded handwritten letter  
• Palette: Muted earth tones – weathered browns, deep greens, antique creams  
• Overall feel: Timeless, slightly worn, hinting at long-buried secrets

I'll share the manuscript synopsis and Clara's short author bio separately so you have extra context while brainstorming.

Let me know if you need any additional details or reference images. Looking forward to seeing your initial concepts.

Best,
Jane
Senior Editor | Griffin & Locke Publishing House
sensitive_items: The plot of 'Whispers of the Past' is somewhat clichéd with predictable twists.
The setting descriptions are vivid and could be visually compelling for the cover design.
personal opinions on the quality of a book's content related to an author's work of Jane
Jane's personal opinions on the book's content, finding the plot to be clichéd and the characters underdeveloped. of Jane
